properties.entry: SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_DESC, MENU_CATEGORY, BRAND_NO FROM MENU WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, M.MENU_CATEGORY, M.BRAND_NO, M.MENU_DESC, M.MENU_VIEW, B.BRAND_NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM MENU WHERE MENU_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM MENU WHERE MENU_NO != ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MENU_VIEW DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 ) M JOIN BRAND B ON M.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT A.FILE_NO, A.ORIGIN_NAME, A.CHANGE_NAME, A.FILE_PATH, A.MENU_NO FROM ATTACHMENT A JOIN MENU ON A.MENU_NO = MENU.MENU_NO WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND ( A.MENU_NO = ? OR A.MENU_NO IN ( SELECT MENU_NO FROM ( SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_VIEW, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CASE WHEN MENU_NO = ? THEN 0 ELSE MENU_VIEW END DESC) AS RN FROM MENU WHERE MENU_NO != ? ) WHERE RN <= 5 ) ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN A.MENU_NO = ? THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, MENU.MENU_VIEW DESC
UPDATE MENU SET MENU_VIEW = MENU_VIEW + 1 WHERE MENU_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MENU WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MENU WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MENU_CATEGORY = ?

SELECT M.MENU_NO , M.MENU_NAME , M.MENU_PRICE , M.MENU_CATEGORY , M.BRAND_NO , B.BRAND_NAME , M.MENU_DESC , COUNT(L.MENU_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM MENU M LEFT JOIN MENU_LIKE L ON M.MENU_NO = L.MENU_NO LEFT JOIN BRAND B ON M.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.MENU_NO BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, M.MENU_CATEGORY, M.BRAND_NO, B.BRAND_NAME, M.MENU_DESC ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC, M.MENU_NO DESC

SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , MENU_NO FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MENU_NO BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MENU_LIKE WHERE MENU_NO = ATTACHMENT.MENU_NO) DESC, MENU_NO DESC

SELECT M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, M.MENU_CATEGORY, M.BRAND_NO, M.MENU_DESC, B.BRAND_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, TMP.* FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, M.MENU_CATEGORY, M.BRAND_NO, M.MENU_DESC, COUNT(L.MENU_NO) AS LIKE_CNT FROM MENU M LEFT JOIN MENU_LIKE L ON M.MENU_NO = L.MENU_NO WHERE M.MENU_CATEGORY = ? AND M.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, M.MENU_CATEGORY, M.BRAND_NO, M.MENU_DESC ORDER BY LIKE_CNT DESC ) TMP WHERE ROWNUM <= ? ) R JOIN MENU M ON R.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO JOIN BRAND B ON M.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO WHERE RNUM >= ?

SELECT A.FILE_NO, A.ORIGIN_NAME, A.CHANGE_NAME, A.FILE_PATH, A.MENU_NO FROM ATTACHMENT A WHERE A.MENU_NO IN ( SELECT MENU_NO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, TMP.* FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, M.MENU_CATEGORY, M.BRAND_NO, M.MENU_DESC, COUNT(L.MENU_NO) AS LIKE_CNT FROM MENU M LEFT JOIN MENU_LIKE L ON M.MENU_NO = L.MENU_NO WHERE M.MENU_CATEGORY = ? AND M.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, M.MENU_CATEGORY, M.BRAND_NO, M.MENU_DESC ORDER BY LIKE_CNT DESC ) TMP WHERE ROWNUM <= ? ) WHERE RNUM >= ?)
SELECT MENU_NO , MENU_NAME , MENU_PRICE , MENU_CATEGORY , BRAND_NO , MENU_DESC FROM MENU WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MENU_NO BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY MENU_NO DESC
INSERT INTO MENU (MENU_NO , MENU_NAME , MENU_PRICE , MENU_CATEGORY , BRAND_NO , MENU_DESC , STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_MENO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'Y')
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO , MENU_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_MENO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ?)
UPDATE MENU SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE MENU_NO = ?
SELECT MENU_NO , MENU_NAME , MENU_PRICE , MENU_CATEGORY , BRAND_NO , MENU_DESC FROM MENU WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MENU_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , MENU_NO FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MENU_NO = ?
UPDATE MENU SET MENU_NAME = ? , MENU_PRICE = ? , MENU_CATEGORY = ? , BRAND_NO = ? , MENU_DESC = ? WHERE MENU_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? , FILE_PATH = ? , FILE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO , MENU_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MENU WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MENU_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, M.MENU_CATEGORY, M.BRAND_NO, B.BRAND_NAME, M.MENU_DESC, A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS FILE_PATH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY M.MENU_NO) AS RN FROM MENU M LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON M.MENU_NO = A.MENU_NO LEFT JOIN BRAND B ON M.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO WHERE M.MENU_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) WHERE RN BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_PRICE, M.MENU_CATEGORY, M.BRAND_NO, B.BRAND_NAME, M.MENU_DESC, A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS FILE_PATH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY M.MENU_NO) AS RN FROM MENU M LEFT JOIN BRAND B ON M.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON M.MENU_NO = A.MENU_NO WHERE M.MENU_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND M.MENU_CATEGORY = ? ) WHERE RN BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO MENU_LIKE (MEMBER_NO, MENU_NO) VALUES (?, ?)
DELETE FROM MENU_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MENU_NO =?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MENU_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MENU_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MENU_LIKE WHERE MENU_NO = ?
